required.title: Web Developer (Co-op)
required.notes: ReactJS, JavaScript, NodeJS, Jest, MongoDB, Mongoose, Git, Bash, HTML, (S)CSS, JSON, YAML

descs.title: Achievements:
points: Built a MongoDB extraction system (and integration testing) which converted collections of user tickets into CSV files, allowing for easier analysis by the team.
Moved survey from external link to in-app. While doing so, improved survey popup by adjusting to user statistics from google analytics.
Added notification banner to website for service outages; operates using google buckets which removes the need to redeploy website.
